title: MSCI Rule Shift May Spur $2 Billion Exit From Indonesian Stocks
description: Global funds may withdraw more than $2 billion from Indonesian equities in coming months if MSCI Inc. proceeds with a change to its indexing methodology, underscoring concerns about the investability of Southeast Asia’s biggest stock market.
content: Global funds may withdraw more than $2 billion from Indonesian equities in coming months if MSCI Inc. proceeds with a change to its indexing methodology, underscoring concerns about the investability of Southeast Asia’s biggest stock market.
